segments.text: This kitchen setup is oddly repulsive right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying that plate, but water's pouring out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking her shoes and the floor in a gross mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No plug, just endless waste splashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a teetering stool, hand in the dusty cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies look stale anyway, who knows how old.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's begging with her hand out, like desperate little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene reeks of neglect and sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't salvage this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unaware and careless they all seem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
